Steamclock Website

UI/UX, Front-end, Ruby, nanoc

I designed a responsive website for Steamclock Software. I walked Steamclock through a process of wireframing, visual ideation, and static prototypes for testing responsive layouts. Copywriting by Allen Pike with help by Nigel Brooke.
